If you want to get a medical test for work permit, you have to:
1. Pay almost 2m vnd for basic tests (2~3 times expensive than ordinary)
2. Get additional test forcely(almost 500k vnd). If you deny getting additional …

2 years later and still good for work permit health checks. 2.5-3 hrs, 1.7 mil. English is limited but they try and are polite. If you get lost enough times someone will walk you to the next place. Don't forget to bring a 4x6 photo
